auto-pull.desc: Allows user to configure the auto-pull script

config.desc: Allows user to configure its GitHub user settings

push.desc: Allows user to stage, commit and push files

generate-ssh.desc: Allows user to generate a new SSH key and dynamically add it to its SSH agent on shell startup

generate-gpg.desc: Allows user to generate a new SSH key and dynamically add it on shell startup

--version.desc: Prints out currently installed package version
